name: Apes Together Strong (Xen)
description:
CONTROLS: WASD to move, space to jump, tab to switch characters, escape to pause (you can use this to restart a level if you get stuck!)

Brackeys Jam 2021.1 had the theme "stronger together" so I went with the first thing that came to mind (I'm surely not the only one): Apes together strong. I created a platformer with 12 levels and three different playable characters. Alone they cannot get to the end, but by switching between them to utilize their unique strengths you can complete each level and prove that they are stronger together!

Made in 7 days. Huge thanks to Ren for making the menu art and character sprites. This is my third game jam and the first one I've entered with a friend and it was great working on it together.

Game made in Godot Engine, sound effects were made by me using BFXR, music was made by me on beepbox.co.
